description: Ms. codex. Title from fol. 2a. Ms. was possibly previously bound with Islamic Manuscripts, Third Series no. 639, Lubb al-asās, as suggested by the paper and the water stains. According to the owner's statement on fol. 2b: "Ṣāra hādhā al-mujallad fī yad Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn Yaḥyá Zabarah fī Rabīʻ al-Ākhir 1359," while a similar inscription on fol. 1a of Third Series no. 639 states: "Ṣārat hādhihi al-nuskhah min Lubb al-asās wa-mā qablahu wa-mā baʻdahu fī yad ... Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn Yaḥyá Zabārah ... fī Rabīʻ al-Awwal 1359." Physical description: 19-20 lines per page; written in naskhi script in black on beige European glazed, laid paper. Catchwords and extensive marginalia; original text in red, except on fol. 242-248 where it is overlined in black. Some damp staining, but text unaffected. Insert between fol. 91-92. Origin: First half of text completed in Shaʻbān 1089 AH (September-October 1678); second half completed in Rabiʻ al-Awwal 1090 AH (April-May 1679). This copy completed by Muḥammad ibn Sharaf al-Dīn ibn Muḥammad ... al-Muṭahhar in Shawwāl 1108 AH (April-May 1697) (fol. 248b). Incipit: بدا حفظه الله تعالى بالبسملة واردفها بالحمد له
author: Ẓafīrī, Jaʻfar ibn ʻAlī, d. 1697 or 8.
abstract: Commentary on Muʼayyad Billāh's work on Zaydī theology, Lubb al-asās. Text is on fol. 2b-248b; notes and extracts on fol. 1a-2a, 249.
extent: ii, 249, ii leaves : paper ; 206 x 151 (152 x 95) mm. bound to 214 x 170 mm.

title.@value: كتاب هداية الاكياس الى عرفان اسرار لب الاساس.
Kitāb Hidāyat al-akyās ilá ʻirfān asrār Lubb al-asās.

uniform_title: Hidāyat al-akyās ilá ʻirfān asrār Lubb al-asās.
هداية الاكياس الى عرفان اسرار لب الاساس.
provenance: Numerous statements of ownership on fol. 2b, dated 1132 H. [1719 or 20], 1192 H. [1778 or 9], 1214 H. [1799 or 1800], 1241 H. [1825 or 6]. Most recent ownership statement by Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn Yaḥyá Zabārah (d. 1961) dated Rabīʻ al-Ākhir 1359 H. [May 1940].
creator: Ẓafīrī, Jaʻfar ibn ʻAlī, d. 1697 or 8.
ظفيري، جعفر بن علي، d. 1697 or 8.
subject: Muʼayyad Billāh, Muḥammad ibn Ismāʻīl, 1634 or 1635-1686—Lubb al-asās.
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
